name: Customized Texas Longhorns BPT PS
description: Custom Texas Longhorns portable beer pong table. This table folds in half for easy transportation and storage. Perfect for tailgating and backyard functions. Custom paint, custom trim, custom decals (one side says "The Competitors" and the other side says "The Champs"). We use off-setting stabilizers to support weight in the middle of table that easily screw on and off when setting up and breaking down. - 8x2ft, 30" tall - Legs and stabilizers are fastened underneath table top to secure during transportation and storage. - HD brass hinges. - Screw-on stabilizers. - 100-lb weight cap.

name: Customized L.A. Lakers BPT TS
description: This custom Los Angeles Lakers beer pong table is perfect for the die-hard Lakers fan. Hand painted, water-sealed, custom decals, custom color trim, and wood finish. Tournament style table that has balls bouncing like a ping pong table. Bar quality showmanship. Unlike aluminum tables, balls actually bounce off our tables making beer pong games more exciting and giving no excuses for your opponents. - 8x2ft, 29" tall (REGULATION LENGTH) - Folding legs - Heavy-duty use. - 200 lbs. weight limit.

name: Customized Dodgers Beer Pong Table
description:
- 8x2ft, 30" tall

- Legs and stabilizers are fastened underneath table top to secure during transportation and storage.

- HD brass hinges.

- Screw-on stabilizers.

name: Beer Pong Tournament!
description:
If you're in the Los Angeles area and would like to promote your bar, pub, pizza parlor, or house party -- Clutch Up! Beer Pong Tournaments can help.  If you are expecting 16 or more participants (at least eight teams) and want to maintain organization and fair play then look no further.  Winners can take home cash prizes, venue product, and even a Clutch Up! Tailgate Table!  

We help promote all of our events and make it easy for potential teams to sign up online.  We can even build a customized table with your venue logo and affiliates to make sure your customers/party goers see your name every time they pass by.     

To schedule a tournament please email us with the following info:

- Name of venue.
- Venue address/phone number/email.
- Name of owner/manager.
- Estimated number of teams (two players per team)
- Any questions you might have.      

For liability reasons: games played in a public venue will be played w/ water cups to prevent the spread of germs and drunk driving.  If teams would like to play with beer then they must ask the venue's manager before doing so.  Rules will be posted online and in venue before start of tournament to avoid any confusion.  Also, brackets will be posted at start of tournament to see head to head match-ups (most tournaments are 2-game elimination).

name: Customized USC Trojans BPT
description:
This custom table is made with a water-proof playing surface that protects against all liquids.  Custom designed stabilizers to support weight in middle of table.  Stabilizers are fastened to table they are not lost during transportation.  Will not rust and will not dent or ding like aluminum tables.  Remember, all of our tables are prepped, primed, and painted before assembling.  All tables handmade and built to standard.   

- 8x2ft (4x2ft when folded) 

- 29" tall.

- Custom border and protective trim applied to edge of table.

- Custom cut folding legs. 

- Off-setting stabilizers.
